name: Reverie Sweatshirt
description: CLICK HERE FOR LOOKBOOK Highly anticipated and certain to make you feel sophisticated. A truly significant design with subtle font work stating: "Dreams are the reality of the future." This piece is for everyone to relate to... Whether you're a dreamer, deep thinker, day dreamer, star gazer, galaxy lover or you just plain like talking to yourself lol... this is for you! Check it out. Contemplate on the artwork and see what meaning it personally has for you. And dream on fellow Kavemen! Available in: Small / Medium / Large / XLarge GARMENT CARE: - Machine wash cold inside out - Wash with like colours - Do not use any bleach - Do not iron if decorated For any of your queries, please contact: sales@kavemanclothing.com

name: Varsity Sweatshirt
description: CLICK HERE FOR LOOKBOOK What you've all been waiting for... the Kaveman Varsity Sweat is back! Tweaked slightly and is now a heather grey in body colour KC Varsity initials on left chest Full back design "Ghettro Trendsetters" Available in: Small / Medium / Large / XLarge GARMENT CARE: - Machine wash cold inside out - Wash with like colours - Do not use any bleach - Do not iron if decorated www.kavemanclothing.com sales@kavemanclothing.com

name: G'DAY Snapback
description:
G'Day - Taken from the Australian greeting 'Hello / Hi'

Features a print under the brim:
WHAT'S THE DILLY - Questioning your current well being.

Top Back embroidery:
HOWDY DO! - 'How are you doing...' Are you happy, sad, could be better? 

At Kaveman Clothing we're proud to push positivity and often people forget to check up on themselves. Just up lifting someones mood can change their day, so it's important to always take a second and check how you're feeling both emotionally and physically. If all is good, smile and bang out the day! 

#FGC - Feel Good Clothing

Size: ONE SIZE FIT ALL
Hat Style: Snapback
Color: Burgundy / Honey Gold 

Shipping WORLDWIDE!!!

Any questions, please ask. Our friendly team is always here to help!
sales@kavemanclothing.com

name: IM ILLY Snapback
description:
I'M ILLY - Taken from the saying 'I'm Dope'

'There isn't know body doper than me, I'm so fresh so clean' - Outkast 

For a word that is so over played [DOPE] we're twisting it up 2012 style!

#FGC - Feel Good Clothing

Size: ONE SIZE FIT ALL
Hat Style: Snapback
Color: Cement Grey / Royal Blue (with hits of Red) 

Shipping WORLDWIDE!!!

Any questions, please ask. Our friendly team is always here to help!
sales@kavemanclothing.com

name: KVMN Basic Tee | White
description:
Our iconic KVMN Box Logo for our tribe...The Go-Getters!
Simple white tee with black print, made available for everyone to cop and represent the movement.

If you:
- Push positivity
- Work Hard
- And are humble to the bone, then this tee is for you!
Because we all about that!

Note:
Hand wash inside out.

Or:
Machine wash cold inside out 
(with like colors)
Do not use bleach.
Do not iron if decorated.

name: Rocky Mountain [Heavy Cuff Beanie]
description: Life is a journey, almost like climbing a mountain. All the bumps and obstacles obstructing you on your way to the top! - ROCKY MOUNTAIN. The beanie features our new constructed knit with the heavy cuffs reminiscent of the humps and bumps of a mountain. The bright gold Pom is your sunrise when you reach your goal and make it to the TOP! (we'll see you there hehe) Care Instructions: Hand wash cold Lay flat to dry 100% Acrylic Made in U.S.A

name: KingDOME [Jersey Beanie]
description: Everyone of us is a leader in our own right, So take this beanie (crown) to your kingdom. Put this on when you feel superior and in power! NOT FOR SWAG'IN lol. Maroon -Represents someone who is patient in battle and yet victorious. Gold - Symbolizes generosity and elevation of the mind. The name is inspired from the concept of being a leader. If you are ruling then your KING. The word 'DOME' symbolizes the head. Care Instructions: Hand wash cold Lay flat to dry 100% Acrylic Made in U.S.A

name: MY CHICK BAD TEE
description:
Our brand new, freshly caught "MCB Tee" was a tough one to hunt.
This t-shirt is self explanatory. Every Kaveman knows who the real boss in the Kave is! C'mon... without them, who would we be trying to impress? :P

This product is a MUST HAVE for all our Kavemen and Kavewomen out there.
We've ensured the highest quality in both print and material. And with new attention to details, you have a final and complete Kaveman product.

Rules of engagement:
Feel fresh and fly as you wear it. Head high and proud of the statement whilst demonstrating respect and kindness to all around you, especially the Kavewomen :)

[Garment Care]
Machine wash cold inside out 
(with like colors)
Do not use bleach.
Do not iron if decorated.

name: OPTIMISTIC TEE [YELLOW]
description:
Our brand new, freshly caught "Optimistic Tee" has landed on the table!
These t-shirts caress your body with the softest touch and is designed to make you feel good whenever its worn. It portrays the optimistic side in every one of us!
We've ensured the highest quality in both print and material. And with new attention to details, you have a final and complete Kaveman product.

Rules of engagement:
Enjoy this product as you wear it, and demonstrate positivity and optimism to all that you encounter :)

Only £25.

Available in:
   - Yellow
   - Purple and
   - Turquoise


[Garment Care]

(with like colors)

name: YUPEE POLO [CHERRY RED]
description: CHERRY RED + CHINO Our first Cut 'n' Sew range for the UPward Collection. FEATURES: • YUPEE embroidered on left chest • Side tag (left side) • Custom neckline piping • Inner body features a ring spun cotton for comfort • Spare button on inside care label   These are slightly smaller in size to give you a comfortable fit, and allow you to flaunt your figure. So go up a size when ordering... i.e - If you take Medium, order a Large if you want your regular fit.  If you want a slimmer fit, then stick to your original size. Example - If your a Medium, order a Medium for a slimmer fit.  If you require further info, hit us up at: sales@kavemanclothing.com [Garment Care] Machine wash cold inside out (with like colors) Do not use bleach. Do not iron if decorated.

name: YUPEE POLO COMBO PACK
description: COMBO PACK DEAL Can't decide which colour you fancy? Like all of them just as much as each other? Then this combo is for you... ALL 4 polos for a LIMITED TIME OFFER of £99 :) PACK INCLUDES: - YUPEE Polo [Purple] - YUPEE Polo [Grey] - YUPEE Polo [Cherry Red] - YUPEE Polo [Carolina Blue] You save £21 on this combo pack deal. name: KAVEMAN XXX BEANIE
description:
Our first accessories piece ever since we established back in 06.
Limited quantity produced, so grab one while stocks last. The hat itself is one size to fit all.
Super comfy, perfect for our early morning go getters ;)

Main body colour of the beanie is grey, with design in yellow and white.
Ribbed cuff - Made thick to keep your lower head and neck warm

Care Instructions:
Hand wash cold
Lay flat to dry
100% Acrylic
Made in U.S.A

name: BORN SURVIVOR SWEATSHIRT
description:
NOW COMES WITH A FREE DUMMYBREAD MAN TEE
Buy it now and wear through the winter and just keep on wearing it!
Don't remove it!
Eat in it, sleep in it, hitch hike in it, swim in it, tell your unborn child about it and repeat da process over and over again.
Just enjoy it guys!
NOTE: All purchases will receive a FREE Dummybread Man Tee! The tee size given will be the same as the sweatshirt size ordered. (Please state the size during ordering process within Paypal if a different size is wanted)
